## Vector2.set() method

Sets the Vector2 coordinates with the given floats

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(x: number, y: number): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the first coordinate |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the second coordinate |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector2`

the current updated Vector2
